programme.title: The Gunman
programme.desc: A sniper on a mercenary assassination team, Martin Terrier (Sean Penn) retires to settle down with his girlfriend, but the organization he works for has other plans for him. Forced to return to Congo, where he had a successful assassination, he finds himself chased by his own his team.

programme.title: Edge of Darkness
programme.desc: Detective Thomas Craven is investigating the murder of his activist daughter. He not only exposes sensitive aspects of her secret life, but also clashes with crime organizations that try to erase any thread that may link her to them.

programme.title: Transformers: The Last Knight
programme.desc: Optimus Prime finds his home planet, Cybertron, now a dead planet, and tries to find the person behind its death. He finds a way to bring the planet back to life, but in order to do so, he needs to find an artifact, which is on Earth.

programme.title: Dracula Untold
programme.desc: When the lives of his wife and child are put in danger by a bloodthirsty sultan, prince Vlad risks his soul to save them.

programme.title: Divergent
programme.desc: In a future Chicago setting, people are divided into five distinct factions based on their personalities. Beatrice discovers that she is Divergent, meaning she does not fit into any one faction, and soon uncovers a sinister plot brewing in her seemingly perfect society.

programme.title: Central Intelligence
programme.desc: Accountant Calvin Joyner and Bob Stone ,are old schoolmates who reconnect through Facebook. But Calvin suddenly finds himself lured into the world of espionage and collecting information with its various dangers.

programme.title: Walking Tall
programme.desc: An ex-army officer returns to his home town wanting to work in the local mill, but he finds the town filled with drugs and corruption after the mill was closed and turned into a Casino.

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: After discovering that an asteroid the size of Texas is heading towards Earth, threatening to destroy mankind, NASA sends a team of drillers and geologists, to drill inside the asteroid and blow it from the inside with a warhead.

programme.title: Insurgent
programme.desc: Beatrice Prior must go on saving the ones she loves and confront her inner demons to fight against a powerful alliance that is threatening her society.

programme.title: This Means War
programme.desc: Tuck and Frank (Tom Hardy and Chris Pine) are two best friends and CIA agents. They fall in love with the same girl, Lauren (Reese Witherspoon). She's confused between both of them. Both men agree to let her choose. But they just can't stop using their skills to keep tabs on her.

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: Two new York detectives, through a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity, gain a reputation for being among the best city-wide, but things are not exactly as they were thinking, especially when they investigate David Ershon.

programme.title: John Wick: Chapter 2
programme.desc: Retired assassin John Wick (Keanu Reeves) unwillingly returns to the criminal underworld to repay a debt, but is faced with many challenges along the way, including a bounty that has been put on his life.

programme.title: Tropic Thunder
programme.desc: A film director's plans to shoot his upcoming war movie in the jungle quickly go south when the film crew faces a series of complications, from land mines to local drug lords.

programme.title: RoboCop
programme.desc: Set in a dystopian future where crime rates have become insanely high, evil corporation Omni Consumer Products tries to create a prototype that is half-robot and half-human. When RoboCop learns about their intrigues, he turns on his masters.

programme.title: Code of Silence
programme.desc: Eddie Cusack is a Chicago police officer who goes on a special mission with his team. When the stakeout unexpectedly turns into a shootout, he finds himself in the middle of a gang war.

programme.title: Walking Tall
programme.desc: An ex-army officer returns to his home town wanting to work in the local mill, but he finds the town filled with drugs and corruption after the mill was closed and turned into a Casino.

programme.desc: Beatrice Prior must go on saving the ones she loves and confront her inner demons to fight against a powerful alliance that is threatening her society.

programme.title: This Means War
programme.desc: Tuck and Frank (Tom Hardy and Chris Pine) are two best friends and CIA agents. They fall in love with the same girl, Lauren (Reese Witherspoon). She's confused between both of them. Both men agree to let her choose. But they just can't stop using their skills to keep tabs on her.

programme.title: Transformers
programme.desc: The Decepticons' leader is looking for a miraculous super stone that gives its holder supernatural strength. The only one able to get to the stone is Sam, a college student, and his friend Mikaela. Will he be able to save the world before the stone falls into the hands of the Decepticons.

programme.title: Ghost in the Shell
programme.desc: An adaptation of the Japanese animated high-tech film, a special ops human-cyborg hybrid called The Major leads Section 9, which is an elite task force team. Devoted to stopping the most dangerous criminals and extremists, Section 9 is faced with an enemy whose singular goal is to wipe out Hanka Robotic's advancements in cyber technology.

programme.title: The Divergent Series: Allegiant
programme.desc: Tris and Four make the hard decision to leave their home behind in an attempt to find a way to save Chicago from turmoil. However, they end up being taken to a city of hidden secrets where they end up learning the backstory of how their world became what it is.

programme.title: Mr & Mrs. Smith
programme.desc: A married couple going through marriage counseling discover that they are both assassins working for competing agencies when they are charged with killing each other.

programme.title: John Wick: Chapter 3 - Parabellum
programme.desc: In this sequel, John Wick has killed a member of the High Table, a shadowy international assassin's guild, deeming him an excommunicado (excluded member) and raising a US$ 14 million price tag for his head. A whole world of ruthless hit men and women are pursuing him around every corner.

programme.title: The Kingdom
programme.desc: When an American facility in the Middle East is bombarded, a group of U.S. government agents is asked to investigate the incident and find the culprits in a snowballing battle.

programme.title: Equilibrium
programme.desc: In the future, the system that governs the world denies art, music, books, and feelings. ( John Preston) the man in charge of enforcing the law, rebels against it and tries to destroy it.

programme.title: Transformers
programme.desc: The Decepticons' leader is looking for a miraculous super stone that gives its holder supernatural strength. The only one able to get to the stone is Sam, a college student, and his friend Mikaela. Will he be able to save the world before the stone falls into the hands of the Decepticons.

programme.title: Gretel and Hansel
programme.desc: Desperate to find work to support themselves, siblings Hansel and Gretel stumble upon a remote house in the woods whose owner offers them food and work, only for them to come to realize the terrifying secret that she is hiding.

programme.title: Paycheck
programme.desc: Michael is an engineer, who has his memory erased after completing each job. When the wealthy James Rithrick offers him a multiple-year contract, with the same conditions, he realizes that erasing his memory has erased crucial details of the work assignment.(n)

programme.title: Ride Along
programme.desc: As a way to prove himself worthy of marrying Angela, James' sister, security guard Ben joins her cop brother on a day long patrol of Atlanta.(n)

programme.title: Ride Along 2
programme.desc: James and Ben team up again for a second Ride Along film.James and Ben team up again for a second Ride Along, and try to bust some drug dealing operations in Miami, before Ben’s wedding to James’ sister.(n)

programme.title: 16 Blocks
programme.desc: Detective Jack Mosley, who is an alcoholic, is assigned a last minute mission after a hard day's work. The mission is to escort a witness 16 blocks from the police station to the courthouse, but he discovers that several people want the witness dead, and Jack is faced with an unlikely situation where he has to choose between his duty and his loyalty to his police officer colleagues.(n)

programme.title: Chaos
programme.desc: Two cops partner up in order to uncover how a group of bank robbers managed to escape from a bank during a heist that apparently has other motives than just stealing money.(n)

programme.title: Spy Game
programme.desc: CIA operative Tom Bishop asks the retired Nathan Muir to help him when he is arrested in China. While on this mission, Nathan recalls all the situations that affected his and Tom's relationship.(n)

programme.title: Train to Busan
programme.desc: As a father and his daughter board the train from Seoul to Busan, they find themselves in a fight for survival as they are caught in the middle of a zombie outbreak.(n)

programme.title: Train to Busan Presents: Peninsula
programme.desc: Four years after the zombie outbreak in Train to Busan, a soldier and his team are tasked with going to the wastelands of the Korean Peninsula where they have to relive the terrifying horror once again.(n)

programme.title: Top Gun
programme.desc: The Naval Fighter Weapons School witnesses a fierce competition between two students, nicknamed Maverick and Iceman, as they try to win the school's top trophy.(n)

programme.title: Navy Seals
programme.desc: During a rescue mission, Navy Lieutenant Curran learns that things are more complicated than he thought, as the terrorists he and his team are up against have gotten nuclear weapons.(n)

programme.title: The Choice
programme.desc: Irfan is an idealistic professor who gets out of a job and he is in a dilemma as the doors close one by one in his face and he has to find a way to look after his sick son, even if this means getting into an inescapable dark adventure.

programme.title: The Confirmation
programme.desc: An awkward father-son weekend starts to look a bit better when the most unlikely of events brings them together. As the two team up to find the father's stolen toolbox, they form a bond that heralds a better relationship between them.

programme.title: Departures
programme.desc: Soon after losing his job, the cellist Daigo hopes that his move back to his hometown will make things easier. But when a misunderstanding leaves him with a job so far beyond his expectation, he finds comfort and a sense of joy in his new role as he prepares the dead for their journey into the afterlife.

programme.title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: Four high school kids discover an old video game console and are drawn into the game's jungle setting, literally becoming the adult avatars they chose. What they discover is that you don't just play Jumanji - you must survive it in order to beat the game and return to the real world.

programme.desc: Irfan is an idealistic professor who gets out of a job and he is in a dilemma as the doors close one by one in his face and he has to find a way to look after his sick son, even if this means getting into an inescapable dark adventure.

programme.title: Keep Watching
programme.desc: When a group of intruders have a family imprisoned in their home and forced to play a game of life and death, the peculiar rules of the game become clearer as the night approaches, and the family learns that while they're living their worst nightmare, the whole world is streaming and watching.

programme.title: Hansel & Gretel: Witch Hunters
programme.desc: Putting a twist on the old fairytale, "Hansel & Gretel" brings us the siblings as grown up bounty hunters who track and kill witches all over the world. As the Blood Moon approaches, the pair encounter a new evil that might hold a secret to their past.

programme.title: The Intouchables
programme.desc: Inspired by the true story of the unlikely friendship between an aristocratic millionaire and his immigrant caregiver, who was hired to look after him following a paragliding accident that left him quadriplegic.

programme.title: Switched
programme.desc: A bullied teenager makes a wish for her tormentor, the most popular girl in school, to experience life through her own eyes. But when her wish gets granted, she is shocked when she switches bodies with her nemesis.

programme.title: The Choice

programme.title: Surf's Up 2: WaveMania
programme.desc: In a bid to regain his former glory, a surfer penguin tries to prove himself fit to join a team of extreme surfers by trying to surf a 50-foot wave.

The Intouchables

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: A chance encounter between a songwriter and a trio of musically-inclined chipmunks spells the start of a great musical partnership. But as the unusual collaboration brings them fame, a nefarious record executive plots to drive a wedge between Dave and the chipmunks for his own gain.

programme.title: The Revenant
programme.desc: In the 19th century America, deep in the uncharted American wilderness, hunter Hugh Glass is severely injured and left for dead. With sheer will as his only weapon, Glass must navigate a hostile environment, a brutal winter, and warring Native American tribes in a relentless quest to survive.

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Grey
programme.desc: A routine interview between college senior Anastasia Steele and influential businessman Christian Grey, turns into a game of mystery and desire, as she slowly discovers his hidden tendencies.

programme.title: Flightplan
programme.desc: On her way back to New York after retrieving her husband's body, the grieving Kyle wakes up from a nap to find her 6-year-old daughter Julie missing. As she searches the plane for her daughter, everyone insists that Julie was never on the plane in the first place.

programme.title: Dark Waters
programme.desc: The true story of how one man stood up against a major corporation after the latter is connected to a number of deaths. Filing a lawsuit against the company, he faces a tremendous amount of pressure as he tries to put a stop to their practices that pollute the environment.

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: The film tells of a suspicious video of some strange scenes, after the viewer sees it, he gets a phone call telling him that he will die after 7 days.

programme.title: Wendy
programme.desc: As Wendy ends up on a mysterious island where children can not grow old, the joy that hangs around the ever-youthful children begins to sour when an accident turns Wendy's brother resentful, threatening to change the very nature of the island and the everlasting youth it grants.

programme.title: Aloha
programme.desc: In Hawaii, a military contractor relives his glory days at the site of his greatest achievement. But his return to the island stirs up past memories with his former girlfriend, which makes his new feeling for his Air Force liaison more complicated.

programme.title: A.I. Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: The intelligence of mankind has reached an unimaginable level. A private company created a robot in the form of a child called David, which is adopted by a family that almost lost their child because of his illness. A strong bond between David and his mother Monica develops. But all of this soon turned into a handful of complications after Monica's son healed and returned home.

programme.title: Jobs
programme.desc: The extraordinary story of Steve Jobs: from college dropout to Apple founder, entrepreneur, and creator of one of the most widespread devices of the 21st century, the iPhone.

programme.title: Gold
programme.desc: Based on a true story, the movie revolves around Kenny Wells and Michael Acosta, two friends who set off on an adventure in the uncharted jungle of Indonesia in the hopes of finding gold.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: As Curtis tries to make it as a music manager, he provides a career change for a girls' band that consists of three soul singers. But as he tries to make the band into headliner material, he ends up demoting then firing the lead singer to replace her with another whom he deems more fit for stardom.

programme.title: Chicago
programme.desc: (Roxie Hart ) and (Velma Kelly) each commit a murder; Roxie killed her boyfriend , and Velma killed her husband and sister. The two women grab the attention of the Chicago media,that love scandals. They both share the same lawyer (Billy Flynn) who tries to acquit them of their charges.

programme.title: Bride Wars
programme.desc: Two childhood best friends become enemies when their weddings coincide on the same day, and each of them refuses to postpone the ceremony.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of Mitch Buchannon, a devoted life guard who butts heads with a new recruit, as they uncover a crime that could threaten the future of the bay.

programme.title: Killing Them Softly
programme.desc: Jackie Cogan (Brad Pitt) is a paid assassin who is hired to find the robbers of a Mob protected card game; that caused the local criminal economy to fall apart.

programme.title: The Light Between Oceans
programme.desc: A lighthouse keeper and his wife living off the coast of Western Australia, find a baby in a lifeboat. After they adopt the child, they learn later that a boat accident occurred at the same time they found the child and a woman tells them that she lost her husband and her child that day.

programme.title: About Time
programme.desc: At 21, Tim's father (Bill Nighy) tells him all the men in the family have the ability to time travel. Tim uses his new skill to craft the perfect romance with the girl of his dreams (Rachel McAdams), but his unusual lifestyle comes with unexpected and tragic consequences.

programme.title: Unleashing Mr. Darcy
programme.desc: A modern-day Pride and Prejudice that sees Elizabeth Scott clashing with Donovan Darcy at a dog show after his attitude rubs her the wrong way. Despite sharing a mutual attraction, their relationship goes downhill as a series of misunderstandings ensue, until they get a real look at each other.

programme.title: Wild Hogs
programme.desc: A group of ambitious bikers go on a road trip on a search for adventure, and come face-to-face with the mean Mexican gang, Del Fuegos, who decide to steal one of the Wild Hogs' bikes.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
programme.desc: The young hobbit, Frodo from the Shire finds himself tasked with destroying the powerful One Ring, by forming a Fellowship of eight companions and together they go on an epic journey to save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: Armed with a technology that enables him to enter people's dreams and get access to their subconscious, Dom is hired to carry out a complicated task: set up the perfect circumstances to plant an idea in the mind of a businessman in the dream world.

programme.title: Signs
programme.desc: Set in Milwaukee, Pennsylvania, a family lives on a farm. One day, they find mysterious large circles in their crops, and eventually, discover that these circles are appearing in different parts of the world, which causes them to panic and try to find out the cause behind these 'signs', that may be formed from extraterrestrial beings.

programme.title: Braveheart
programme.desc: Twenty years after the death of his father and brother at the hands of the English, Scottish rebel William Wallace returns to his homeland after becoming an expert in the arts of war . Forming a fierce military force from the villagers against the English, who murdered his secret bride.

programme.title: Harley Davidson and the Marlboro Man
programme.desc: Two lifelong buddies try to help their friend after they know that the bank is going to foreclose his bar and set up a new branch instead. They decide to rob the bank, but they get into big trouble.

programme.title: Wild Hogs

programme.desc: When Gwen's plans to get engaged on her 30th birthday fall through, she makes a wish to be able to see into the future. But instead of offering answers, her glimpse into the future sends her into a tailspin as it raises questions about whether she is with the right man.(n)

programme.title: The Children Act
programme.desc: A renowned High Court Judge deals with a personal crisis just as she has to rule on one of the hardest cases of her life. Her ruling is what determines whether an underage leukemia patient can refuse a life-saving blood transfusion for religious reasons or not.(n)

programme.title: You Again
programme.desc: Marni is a successful businesswoman who returns to her hometown for the marriage of her older brother. She finds that he's about to marry the girl who bullied her in high school. Things get worse when Marni's mother comes face-to-face with the girl's aunt, who was also bothering her in high school.(n)

programme.title: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy
programme.desc: The film goes back to 1970's San Diego, where media was considered extremely important, and state news were taken seriously. Ron Burgundy, is respected by his audience for his credibility and one of the top-rated anchormen, which is about to change when Veronica, a beautiful anchorwoman, is hired at the TV station. From that moment, a competition ensues between Veronica and Burgundy.(n)

programme.title: Silver Linings Playbook
programme.desc: Pat Solitano, a hothead with bipolar disorder, is fresh out of a mental institution and has to move back home with his parents. His plans for getting his life back on track get derailed when he meets the equally eccentric and neurotic Tiffany.(n)

programme.title: American Hustle
programme.desc: In the late 1970s, FBI agent Richie DiMaso forces con artists Irving and Sydney to devise an elaborate sting operation on corrupt politicians.(n)

programme.title: Winter's Bone
programme.desc: When her father vanishes after putting their family home on the line, the teenage Ree is left with no choice but to go looking for him in the hopes of saving her family from a grim fate.(n)

programme.title: The Grey
programme.desc: In the North Pole within dramatic events, an oil drilling team faces harsh conditions and predatory wolves after their plane crash.(n)

programme.title: When Harry Met Sally
programme.desc: The events begin during the trip to New York with Harry and Sally. Harry planned to start working in a wide-ranging institution. Meanwhile, Sally had planned to attend journalism, and their relationship would start through a dispute over their accidental meeting, and their relationship would evolve over time.(n)

programme.title: The Titan
programme.desc: With Earth slowly becoming inhabitable, humanity has started looking to space for a new place to live. An experiment is launched to manage human evolution in a way that adapts to a new life in space, but tampering with evolution comes at a steep price.

programme.title: Ice on Fire
programme.desc: The film highlights the problem of climate change, how to resolve it by controlling high carbon levels in the atmosphere, and how to reduce temperatures around the world. It deals with the many human errors that led to this phenomenon and the solutions to remedy it.

programme.title: Hitman's Wife's Bodyguard
programme.desc: Bodyguard Michael Bryce finds himself embroiled in a new dangerous mission, as he teams up with hitman Darius Kincaid and his wife Sonia in order to thwart a cyberattack in Europe.

programme.title: In the Key of Love
programme.desc: After walking away from her former life to take over her grandmother's wedding photography business, the past comes calling for Maggie when she is hired for the wedding of her ex-boyfriend's sister. It turns out that there is still a spark between the two, just waiting to be reignited.

programme.title: Chaos Walking
programme.desc: After a virus kills all the women on New World, the survivors face yet another challenge as their every thought gets turned into visions, overwhelming their senses and driving them to insanity. Among the chaos, Todd finds Viola, a girl who may have a way to silence all the noise.

programme.title: Snake Eyes
programme.desc: A look into the origins of Snake Eyes and how he made it to being a G.I.

programme.title: Mighty Oak
programme.desc: Years after her brother dies, Gina runs across the music prodigy Oak Scoggins. While anyone would only be taken by Oak's talent, Gina sets her eyes on reuniting her old band as she becomes convinced that Oak is actually the reincarnation of her late brother.

programme.title: Dark Waters
programme.desc: The true story of how one man stood up against a major corporation after the latter is connected to a number of deaths. Filing a lawsuit against the company, he faces a tremendous amount of pressure as he tries to put a stop to their practices that pollute the environment.

programme.title: F9: The Fast Saga
programme.desc: Dominic Toretto and his crew find themselves facing the ultimate threat, after Cipher decides to use Jakob, Dom's younger brother to help her take Dom down.

programme.title: Ad Astra
programme.desc: A military based engineer travels to the outer edges of the solar system to find his missing father who disappeared while on a mission in search of space life twenty years ago.

programme.title: Last Night in Soho
programme.desc: Eloise, a young fashion design student, admires the well-known 1960s singer, Sandy. But things take an unexpected turn when Eloise finds herself back to 1960s London, but surprisingly with her soul inside the body of her favorite superstar.

programme.title: Spell
programme.desc: After he crash-lands in rural Appalachia, a man faces a terrible fate when he's captured by a Hoodoo witch, as he must escape from her black magic and save himself and his family from evil rituals before it's too late.

programme.title: The Wolf of Snow Hollow
programme.desc: In the town of Snow Hollow, Officer John Marshall is skeptical about the existence of werewolves, that is until mutilated bodies start turning up every full moon.

programme.title: The Rest of Us
programme.desc: When her ex-husband dies suddenly, Cami reluctantly steps in to help his new family after his death left them in a dire situation. Inviting them into her home, Cami and her daughter are left to try and deal with their feelings towards the newcomers, as well as their lingering grief.

programme.title: Mighty Oak

programme.title: Home by Spring

programme.title: F9: The Fast Saga

programme.desc: Based on a true story; a retelling of the negotiations that took place against the backdrop of the Oslo Peace Accords in the 1990s between the Palestinian Liberation Organization and the government of Israel in which Norway acted as an intermediary.

programme.title: A Quiet Place Part II

programme.title: Wander Darkly
programme.desc: After going through a traumatic accident, the couple Adrienne and Matteo find themselves experiencing a surreal state of being, where they have to confront their past before dealing with their uncertain future.

programme.title: Galveston
programme.desc: As he barely escapes a fatal set up by his mobster boss, hitman Ryan finds himself accompanied by Rocky, a young prostitute that he saves, as he tries to find his way back to his hometown to recuperate and plan his revenge.

programme.desc: Marco Macaco works as a beach officer and loves the beautiful Lulu, who's fascinated by Marco's rival, Carlo, who builds a gigantic monkey-shaped casino on Marco's beach. Marco discovers Carlo's evil plans and tries to stop him.

programme.title: Mia and the Migoo
programme.desc: After the death of her mother, Mia tries to find her father, who was trapped in a landslide at a construction site following a natural disaster. Joined by Migoo and her friends, Mia sets out to find her father.

programme.title: The Wish Fish
programme.desc: Opil is an 8-year-old boy who detests the dish called 'The Wish Fish' that his mother makes. Resentful of the meal, he wishes that aliens invade the planet and all the fish will vanish. When the wish comes true, a group of villains appears, and Opil starts to realize what he has done.

programme.title: The Apple & The Worm
programme.desc: The story of narcissistic apple Torben, who, like all the apples in the tree, dreams of being shiny, afraid of anything that disturbs its beauty, and when Torben is infected with a worm ,he gets kicked out. On his journey to get the worm out, he meets other characters who change his life for the better.

programme.title: American Hustle
programme.desc: In the late 1970s, FBI agent Richie DiMaso forces con artists Irving and Sydney to devise an elaborate sting operation on corrupt politicians.

programme.title: Reprisal
programme.desc: In the wake of his coworker's death during a bank heist, a bank manager, Jacob, enlists the help of his neighbor, an ex-cop called James, to locate the perpetrator of the crime, only for the perpetrator to raise the stakes when he kidnaps Jacob's wife and daughter.

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: When a legal loophole leaves one of the murderers of his family free, Clyde steps in to brutally correct the miscarriage of justice. But taking the lives of the two murderers is not enough; he intends to go after everyone who couldn't get them an appropriate sentence, including the DA.

programme.title: 28 Weeks Later
programme.desc: A virus spreads through Great Britain, and the U.S. Army manages to protect the survivors in a small London area, so that they can reproduce and repopulate. Six months later, an affected individual unknowingly brings it back, resulting in deadly chaos all over again.

programme.title: John Wick: Chapter 2
programme.desc: Retired assassin John Wick (Keanu Reeves) unwillingly returns to the criminal underworld to repay a debt, but is faced with many challenges along the way, including a bounty that has been put on his life.

programme.title: True Lies
programme.desc: Harry Tasker lives a double life. At work ,he's a government agent with powers to do what he likes. At home, he's a computer salesman. Harry traces a stolen nuclear weapon in the hands of a fanatical terrorist group, while deciding to offer his wife an exciting adventure she never dreamed of.

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma
programme.desc: An improvised rancher joins the escort that will bring outlaw Ben Wade to Contention City in preparation for his transfer to the Yuma Territorial Prison. The simple journey gets complicated by the pursuit of Wade's gang, an attack by the Apaches and a prisoner well-versed in escaping the law.

programme.title: American Hustle
programme.desc: In the late 1970s, FBI agent Richie DiMaso forces con artists Irving and Sydney to devise an elaborate sting operation on corrupt politicians.

programme.title: Deja Vu
programme.desc: When an A.T.F agent is assigned to investigate a terrorist attack, he makes use of a special new technology that enables him to see four days in the past. But can a glimpse into the past help him to stop the perpetrator's next attack in the present.

programme.title: Hands of Stone
programme.desc: The film revolves around the life of the famous boxer (Roberto Duran), where his career began at a very early age, playing for the world championship of average weight before the global boxer (Sugar Ray Leonard), and during the match surprised all the audience and all the viewers of the game by going to the corner of the ring and saying his famous words (not more).

programme.title: Pride and Prejudice and Zombies
programme.desc: An adaptation of Jane Austen's classic that follows several tangled relationships between lovers in the 19th century England, with the addition of an army of Zombies.

programme.title: The Heat
programme.desc: In this cop comedy, a very unlikable pair is made when the prickly FBI agent Sarah Ashburn has to team up with a crude Boston cop Shannon Mullins to track down a ruthless drug lord.

programme.title: Our Kind of Traitor
programme.desc: The couple Perry and Gail are on a holiday to save their marriage, they encounter a Russian millionaire who is involved with the mafia. He asks for their help to have an informal alliance with the British intelligence services in exchange for exposing corruption that runs deep in London.

programme.title: Bright Star
programme.desc: Spanning three years before the death of the romantic poet John Keats, the film depicts his encounter with the free-spirited Fanny Brawne as she becomes intrigued by the taciturn poet as they struggle their way through life.

programme.title: A Dark Place
programme.desc: When a backwoods town is rocked by the disappearance of a local boy whose body is then found in the river, the local garbage truck driver becomes obsessed with finding the truth behind his death, whatever the cost may be.

programme.title: Phone Booth
programme.desc: Stuart Shepard, is a cheating husband who works as a publicist, and uses the pay phone to call his girlfriend because his wife looks over the phone bills. One day the phone rings, and he answers it, only to be threatened by a sniper who threatens him with death if he hangs up the call or leaves the booth. A red point appearing on Stuart's forehead confirms that the sniper is serious.

programme.title: I'm Not Here
programme.desc: An aging and weakened man, contemplates a life that's full of loss and mistakes. As he tries to figure out how he ended up lonely and broken, although there is still some hope for him.

programme.title: Whatever Works
programme.desc: In the wake of a suicide attempt, Boris looks for a fresh start away from his upscale life that proves burdensome. His path intersects with Melody, a Southern beauty queen with none of the privileges and sophistication he possesses. As an unlikely bond forms, he imparts his life lessons on her.

programme.title: Inconceivable
programme.desc: Katie, a mysterious young woman, is moving with her daughter to escape her past, when she meets Angela Morgan, a mother of one single child who dreams of having a bigger family, yet she has problems with her husband Brian, who eventually invites Katie to move in with them to be their son’s nanny.

programme.title: Slumdog Millionaire
programme.desc: (Jamal Malik) a poor youngster who grew up in Mumbai, becomes the contestant on the Indian version of (Who Wants To Be A Millionaire?). He is arrested for suspected cheating on the program. While he's interrogated ,the events show his difficult history that explains why he answers the questions.

programme.title: Thunder Road
programme.desc: Police officer Jim Arnaud suffers from a breakdown after his separation from his wife and the death of his mother.

programme.title: Café Society
programme.desc: This is a love story about making choices at a time of uncertainty. When the Bronx native Bobby arrives to Hollywood, hoping to start a career in the film industry, he crosses paths with a lovely woman who just happens to be seeing a married man. Where does this leave them.

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence
programme.desc: Twenty years after the alien invasion that threatened the destruction of mankind, the alien mothership comes to Earth and the armies of the world have to work together to protect the planet from annihilation.

programme.title: The Rider
programme.desc: After suffering a serious head injury that almost killed him, a young cowboy pledges to find his new identity, trying to discover what it means to be a man living in the heart of America.

programme.title: At Eternity's Gate
programme.desc: The film takes a look at the life of painter Vincent Van Gogh during the time he lived in his French exile, where he worked to develop his artistic sense, fighting his inner demons, and strengthening his bond with his friend French artist Paul Gauguin.

programme.title: The Bank Job
programme.desc: This film takes place in 1970s London; Terry Leather is a salesmen, happily married with children, and few secrets to keep. When an old friend, Martine Love, offers up a scheme to make some quick cash, Terry finds himself unable to refuse. With the help of a carefully selected crew including Kevin Swain and David Shilling, they rent a warehouse on Baker Street and begin tunneling to the nearby Loyd Bank. With their eye on the money stored in the bank’s safety deposit boxes, the crew finds themselves in for much more than they bargained.

programme.title: The Endless
programme.desc: Two brothers revisit the UFO death cult that they escaped a decade ago after they receive a cryptic video message in hopes of finding closure.

programme.title: Vicky Cristina Barcelona
programme.desc: Two girlfriends, Cristina and Vicky, one more rooted in sensuality and the other in logic and routine, travel to Barcelona and meet the charming painter Juan Antonio who becomes involved with both of them. Also in the mix is his passionate and unstable ex-wife, Maria.

programme.title: Get Carter
programme.desc: Jack Carter, who left his home in Seattle years ago and moved to Las Vegas, returned to the funeral of his brother Richard after his death in a road accident during a storm. He suspects that he was killed and is after the killers.

programme.title: Inconceivable

programme.title: Elvis & Nixon
programme.desc: On the morning of December 21, 1970 during the presidency of Richard Nixon , Elvis Presley asked for an interview with President Nixon at the White House, during the interview at the Oval Office, Elvis gave the oath as a secret agent for the Drug enforcement office.

programme.title: Austin Found
programme.desc: Fed up with her mundane life, a woman comes up with a scheme to gain publicity, plotting with her ex-boyfriend and an ex-con to kidnap her 11-year-old daughter.

programme.title: The Magic of Belle Isle
programme.desc: When novelist Monty Wildhorn loses the motivation to write, his nephew persuades him to spend the summer in quiet Belle Isle. He befriends a single mother and her three girls and they give him the inspiration he needs to write again.
